imdb.plot outline: H2-Hilarious History features historical footage from the UCLA film and television archive mixed with humor, facts and quirky trivia. Hosted by H2, a peculiar robot, each episode features some of the funniest, most unbelievable moments ever captured on film.
imdb.title: H2 Hilarious History
plot: H2-Hilarious History features historical footage from the UCLA film and television archive mixed with humor, facts and quirky trivia. Hosted by H2, a peculiar robot, each episode features some of the funniest, most unbelievable moments ever captured on film.::Anonymous
